name: Fly Lugu Flight Training
about: Fly Lugu Flight Training, located in the terminal building of Westfield-Barnes Municipal Airport in Western Massachusetts, is committed to being a leader in flight training. We prioritize uncompromised safety, unparalleled quality, and a customer-centric approach. Our fleet includes Cessna C172s and C150s, renowned as the top training aircraft. Founded by Rika, a second-generation pilot and flight instructor, Fly Lugu aims to serve the local community and champion STEM education. Our team, including experienced instructors like Ken, Michael, Chris, and Justin, offers a thorough and organized training program, ensuring students achieve their goals on time and within budget. We provide various programs, including ground school, scenic flights, and plane rentals. Our mission is to train competent, proficient, and safe pilots while engaging the community in the world of aviation. Come Fly with Me The Sky Isn't Your Limit
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
